reviews.review: Though not without its flaws, Thanos is so strong of a antagonist that this movie was able to be lifted above them. Excited for pt 2
Awesome but it couldâ€™ve been 10x as better of it was more darker and less comedy
From a fans point of view the movie was not at all enticing as it killed off many of its universe characters that have sequals still coming out.

Better than the first two. Despite it's shocking ending, The Avengers: Infinity War is an amazing, awesome, excellent, and flawless movie that is for sure one of the best. Can't wait for the forth one. This movie is absolutely Oscar worthy great. The characters are great. The villain is of course easy to hate. This is the movie that people should love so much just like I do. The Avengers: Infinity War is the bomb.

As a huge fan of the MCU, Marvel Cinematic Universe, this movie is absolutely fantastic to me. After 10, long years of Marvel movies, we get a movie that connects all of them, besides one movie that I won't say for spoiler reasons. However, I do understand that this movie can be fan service. This happens to be the single flaw I found in this movie. If you don't know what I mean by that, It means that you probably won't understand this movie if you haven't, at least, seen a couple of the MCU films. Besides that, this movie is a touching, adventurous, superhero classic that you will thoroughly enjoy, as long as you like superhero films and understand the franchise.
Fights were fun. bit of a dead fish when it comes to emotional response.

Their are so many fantastic characters in this film and yet it doesn't manage to feel crowded. The villlain is fantastic and has a realistic motive. The movie was very funny yet was able to capture many emotional scenes. The only real criticism I have is that I feel they could have done more with some characters but that's bound to happen in a film with this many people. All in all it's a great movie with a ending that makes you want more and will leave you crying at the same time.

This movie was a masterpiece. The plot was very rock solid. They kept everything together and it was very funny and extremely entertaining. For the first time ever, there was a villain who you could understand why he was doing what he was doing. Great action and CGI.
This movie is great! It has comedy it has story it has a mysterious ending a great movie!!!    the only bad thing is gamora dies off in only half the movie

Infinity War' may not be the best movie of all time, or even perfect, but it is totally the bigger cinematic event of all time, and the most epic. Almost every character had his moment to shine, and even that it is a too big movie, it never felt overstuffed, just epic.
